segments.text: I see the boy standing on the stool, and it makes me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, and the stool looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl next to him, looking up with such expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, but also a bit sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being quite brave, but also quite reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of fear, watching the stool wobble and the water overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water pouring onto the floor, creating a puddle that's getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being quite clever, but also quite naughty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt, but I also hope they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand just watching this; someone needs to do something before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
